net.casper.data.model

Class CDataConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.data.model.CTypes
      • net.casper.data.model.CDataConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class CDataConverter
extends CTypes
implements Serializable
    Provides functionality to convert data from one type to another in the dataset implementation. This is primarily called from within the RowSet. Should be used in conjunction with CTypes.java, which serve as an internal conversion optimization

    The other major suite of conversion functionality involves the conversion of resultset data, into java object types. JDBC api returns primitives when possible, but we need to work with object types within casper datasets.

    Since:
    v1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 111 $
    Author:
    Jonathan Liang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
